member.name: T:C1.WPF.DataGrid.Excel.DataGridExtensions
member.summary: Expose extensions method for the , to export to Excel.

member.name: M:C1.WPF.DataGrid.Excel.DataGridExtensions.Save(C1.WPF.DataGrid.C1DataGrid,System.IO.Stream,C1.WPF.DataGrid.Excel.FileFormat)
member.summary: Saves grid content to the specified stream using the specified file format.

member.name: M:C1.WPF.DataGrid.Excel.DataGridExtensions.Save(C1.WPF.DataGrid.C1DataGrid,System.String,C1.WPF.DataGrid.Excel.FileFormat)
member.summary: Saves grid content to the specified file using the specified file format.
member.param: The name of the file to save to.

member.name: M:C1.WPF.DataGrid.Excel.DataGridExtensions.Save(C1.WPF.DataGrid.C1DataGrid,System.IO.Stream,C1.WPF.DataGrid.Excel.ExcelSaveOptions)
member.summary: Saves grid content to the specified stream using Excel file format.
member.param: Save options, can be a null value.

member.name: M:C1.WPF.DataGrid.Excel.DataGridExtensions.Save(C1.WPF.DataGrid.C1DataGrid,System.String,C1.WPF.DataGrid.Excel.ExcelSaveOptions)
member.summary: Saves grid content to the specified Excel file.
member.param: The name of the file to save to.
Save options, can be a null value.

member.name: T:C1.WPF.DataGrid.Excel.ExcelSaveOptions
member.summary: Defines possible options for saving the content to Excel file format.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.DataGrid.Excel.ExcelSaveOptions.FileFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets a specific Excel file format.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.DataGrid.Excel.ExcelSaveOptions.KeepColumnWidths
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether column widths should be kept in a saved file.
member.remarks: If this property is set to True then column widths in a saved Excel file will be the same as in the grid now; otherwise, column will have their default widths. The default value is true.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.DataGrid.Excel.ExcelSaveOptions.KeepRowHeights
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether row height should be kept in a saved file.
member.remarks: If this property is set to True then row heights in a saved Excel file will be set to the property value, in case if the latter is assigned with an absolute value; otherwise, rows will have their default heights. The default value is false.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.DataGrid.Excel.ExcelSaveOptions.CollapsibleGroups
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether groups will be collapsible in a saved file for is in the grouping mode.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.DataGrid.Excel.ExcelSaveOptions.CollapsedGroupLevel
member.summary: Defines the group level at which collapsible group headers will appear collapsed in a saved file.
member.remarks:
The level is a zero-based. Value 0 means that first-level group headers will be collapsed, 1 means that first-level group headers will be expanded while second-level groups will be collapsed, and so on.
A negative value means that all groups at any level will be expanded.
The default value is 0.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.DataGrid.Excel.ExcelSaveOptions.CollapseGroupsBelowDetail
member.summary: Indicates whether group collapse buttons should appear below or above detail rows.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.DataGrid.Excel.ExcelSaveOptions.SaveImages
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether image columns should be saved.

member.name: T:C1.WPF.DataGrid.Excel.ExcelFileFormat
member.summary: Specifies Excel file format.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.DataGrid.Excel.ExcelFileFormat.Xls
member.summary: Excel 97/2003 format (Binary Interchange File Format revision 8).

member.name: F:C1.WPF.DataGrid.Excel.ExcelFileFormat.Xlsx
member.summary: Excel OpenXml format.

member.name: T:C1.WPF.DataGrid.Excel.FileFormat
member.summary: Specifies file formats available for saving the grid.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.DataGrid.Excel.FileFormat.Xlsx
member.summary: Excel OpenXml format.
member.remarks: Creates an Excel xlsx file preserving all content and formatting information, including formatting, fonts, colors, and outline information.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.DataGrid.Excel.FileFormat.Xls
member.summary: Excel 97/2003 format (Binary Interchange File Format revision 8).
member.remarks: Creates an Excel xls file preserving all content and formatting information, including formatting, fonts, colors, and outline information.

member.name: T:C1.WPF.DataGrid.Excel.SaveOptions
member.summary: The base for all classes describing content save options.
